## Data Prep

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}

injuriessum <-
  injuries %>%
  filter(!is.na(Team)) %>%
  count(Relinquised) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))

salarycombined <-
  salary %>%
  left_join(injuriessum, by = c("Player" = "Relinquised"))

```
